name: Tia Mia
description: Mezcal adds an element of smoky surprise to this riff on a mai tai.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 oz. Orgeat Works T’Orgeat Toasted Almond Syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Shake the liquid ingredients quickly with ice, strain into a large rocks glass over the pellet or cobbled ice and garnish with the orchid, lime wheel and mint sprigs.
